name: AVCaptureFileOutputDelegate
desc: Methods for monitoring or controlling the output of a media file capture.

items.name: func fileOutputShouldProvideSampleAccurateRecordingStart(AVCaptureFileOutput) -> Bool
items.desc: Allows a client to opt in to frame accurate recording in fileOutput(_:didOutputSampleBuffer:from:).

items.name: func fileOutput(AVCaptureFileOutput, didOutputSampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer, from: AVCaptureConnection)
items.desc: Gives the delegate the opportunity to inspect samples as they are received by the output and start and stop recording at exact times.
